response: Welcome to Ola's service subscription offerings. With our Ola Care and Ola Care Plus plans, enjoy benefits like free labor service, theft assistance, roadside assistance, and more. Our extended warranty covers your Ola scooter for up to five years, ensuring peace of mind and savings on repairs. Enhance your scooter's utility with our accessories like center stand, buddy step, and scooter cover. Don't forget to check out our graphic printed T-shirts, a part of Ola's eco-friendly revolution. Purchase these services and products easily through our website or app. Enjoy the Ola experience!
title: L1.1.7 Extended Warranty, Value Added Services, Accessories and Merchandise.mp4
